QuestData.Title: The Anima Trail
QuestData.Description:
So the Jailer seeks the Primus's sigil. We must beat the Mawsworn to it. To open the vault, we need to power it with anima.
You helped the Bonesmith repair the first conduit. The trail of anima in front of us leads to the next.
If we can activate it, then there should be enough anima flowing into Korthia to get us inside the vault.
Come, we must make haste!
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the anima trail to the next conduit.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Tal-Galan and Bonesmith Heirmir at the end of the anima trail.
QuestData.RewardText:
A chasm!
We will need a way to get across to the next anima conduit.
